Description_lang: Smolderon decimates his primary target, inflicting $s1 Physical damage$?diff17|diff14[.][ and afflicting them with $@spellname422577.] An additional $421450s1 Fire damage is split evenly among all players within $421450A1 yards of the primary target.All players hit by the effect are branded and afflicted with $@spellname421656.$?diff17[][If $@spellname427969 fails to hit at least $421450s3 players, $428036s1 Fire damage is inflicted to all players and Smolderon gains a stack of $@spellname423896.]
